cause.description:
Recovery Survival Network is a 501(c)(3) non-profit foundation serving the greater Bay Area since 1996. We have been assisting ex- offenders, the homeless, veterans, adults, young adults, at-risk-youth, and people re-entering society from residential drug / alcohol treatment programs, and the criminal justice system. Our main purpose is to combine survival skills training with peer-to-peer recovery and support services.
1. Help People
2. Help More People
3. Help Narcotic Offenders
